tool_description: Generates symbol mappings and glyph specifications for astrological symbols based on selected symbol sets and styles.

symbol_set.description: Symbol set style: traditional, modern, minimalist, geometric, unicode

error_messages: Invalid symbol set: Use one of [traditional, modern, minimalist, geometric, unicode].
Invalid symbol size: Size must be between 8 and 48 pixels.
usage: Choose a symbol set style and size. Returns symbol specifications for all astrological glyphs used in chart rendering.
